# NEDNSProtocol.TLS

**Case**

The DNS server uses DNS-over-TLS.

## Declaration

```swift
case TLS
```

## DNS protocols

- **NEDNSProtocol.cleartext**: The DNS server uses cleartext UDP or TCP over port 53.
- **NEDNSProtocol.HTTPS**: The DNS server uses DNS-over-HTTPS.
